Name: Aizat
description:
Aizat, 27, is married and has 3 children. She has a vocational technical education, knows agricultural techniques and is good at managing money. She has been engaged in livestock breeding since 2010. Through her hard work, she owns 2 cows, 45 sheep, 11 horses and a 2.48-ha plot of irrigated land where she grows clover.

Planning to expand her farming business, Aizat is requesting 150,000 KGS from Bai Tushum Bank. She would like to buy some cows to increase her income from cattle breeding. Aizat plans to reinvest the profits, invest in her children's education and build a house.
